testcase.ruleMessage: ${element.label} is a deprecated item, but has been included in the company extension. Deprecated items should not be used in the filing. Guidance on the replacement item to use for this item is provided in the Deprecated Label of the ${element.name} concept.

variation.name: Creates a fail case deprecated elements are used in the presentation linkbase of the extension taxonomy
variation.description: Creates a fail case when each of the following elements are used in the presentation linkbase of the extension taxonomy: BusinessAcquisitionPurchasePriceAllocationCurrentLiabilitiesDeferredRevenue, BusinessAcquisitionPurchasePriceAllocationCurrentLiabilitiesDeferredRevenue and AccumulatedDepreciationDepletionAndAmortizationSaleOfPropertyPlantAndEquipment.

variation.name: Creates a fail case deprecated elements are used in the presentation linkbase of the extension taxonomy with a value or not.
variation.description: Creates a fail case when the element BusinessCombinationProFormaInformationAbstract appears in the presentation linkbase of the extension taxonomy with no value.

variation.name: Creates a pass case when deprecated elements in the companies namespace are used in the presentation linkbase of the extension taxonomy with a value or not.
variation.description: Creates a pass case when the element StockOptionsMember in the companies namespace appears in the presentation linkbase of the extension taxonomy.

variation.name: Creates a fail case deprecated elements are used in the presentation linkbase of the extension taxonomy with a value or not.
variation.description: Creates 3 fail cases when the element StockOptionsMember, EmployeeServiceShareBasedCompensationAllocationOfRecognizedPeriodCostsReportLineDomain and ScheduleOfEmployeeServiceShareBasedCompensationAllocationOfRecognizedPeriodCostsByReportLineAxis appears in the presentation linkbase of the extension taxonomy.

variation.name: Creates a fail case deprecated elements are used in the presentation linkbase of the extension taxonomy with a value or not.
variation.description: Creates 4 fail case when the axis FinancingReceivableTroubledDebtRestructuringAxis appears in the presentation linkbase of the extension taxonomy. 4 fail cases are created for the line items LoansAndLeasesReceivableImpairedNonperformingAccrualOfInterest, LoansAndLeasesReceivableImpairedNonperformingNonaccrualOfInterest, LoansAndLeasesReceivableGrossCarryingAmount, and LoansAndLeasesReceivableAllowance.
